Server.Added Active Role: As an easier way to find people currently playing, players are now given an active role for 20 minutes after opening a room.

Server.Added .qual (Qualified) Command: Players can now use .qual to check the current top 8 players for their region and platform.

Server.Added New Win/Loss/Cancel Emojis: Updated the win/loss/cancel result reactions to make them easier for players to understand.

Server.Updated Room Messages: The room messages sent upon entering a match room have now been rewritten, making them easier to understand.

Website.Leaderboard Filtering: Added regional filters to the leaderboards so players can filter by region and platform.

Website.Fixed Missing Profile Pictures: Previously if a player left the server and changed their profile picture before joining back it wouldn't be updated in the database and the leaderboards would display a missing image link. This has now been fixed to updated avatars on players rejoining the server.

Website.Added Patch Notes Pages: Added these patch notes pages for each season.

ELO & Ranks.Adjusted Placement Games: A players final standings from season 2 will now affect their placement games.

ELO & Ranks.Removed Iron Rank: The lowest ranked players in season 2 were steel rank. Now someone will be able to reach the blessed inmate role :D

ELO & Ranks.Adjusted Streak Bonus: Players can now only gain a streak bonus when playing against someone who is one rank below or above them.

Admin.Added Mass Revert Function: Previously the revert function only allowed for reverting one game at a time. It's now been updated to revert from multiple game id's or by certain parameters.
